notes.text:
Pound chicken to even thickness
Don't overcrowd the pan when frying
Use good quality marinara sauce

steps.descr: Flatten chicken breasts between plastic wrap

on_enter.say: Right, let's start by flattening those chicken breasts between some plastic wrap. This will help them cook evenly. Give it a good bash!

steps.instructions: Flatten chicken breasts between plastic wrap

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix the breadcrumbs with that lovely grated Parmesan. This is going to give our chicken a fantastic crust.

steps.descr: Dip chicken in egg, then breadcrumb mixture

on_enter.say: Let's coat our chicken. First, dip it in the beaten egg, then into the breadcrumb mixture. Make sure it's nicely covered!

steps.instructions: Dip chicken in egg, then breadcrumb mixture

steps.descr: Fry in oil until golden on both sides

on_enter.say: Time to fry the chicken! Heat some oil in a pan and cook the chicken until it's golden on both sides. You'll hear it sizzle and see it turn a beautiful golden brown.

steps.instructions: Fry in oil until golden on both sides

on_enter.say: Let's add the finishing touches. Top each piece of chicken with a generous spoonful of marinara sauce and a slice of mozzarella. It's going to be delicious!
Pop the chicken in the oven at 180°C. We'll bake it until the cheese is beautifully melted and bubbly. This should take about 10 minutes.

steps.descr: Serve over spaghetti with fresh basil

on_enter.say: Time to serve! Place the chicken over a bed of spaghetti and sprinkle with fresh basil. Enjoy your delicious Chicken Parmesan!

steps.instructions: Serve over spaghetti with fresh basil

recipe.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipe.description: Breaded chicken topped with marinara and melted cheese
